document_data.mainbody:
Thurruvyn Alastrarra was an ancestor of the Alastrarra house of Cormanthyr by the 3 century DR.
On the year , Naeryndam Alastrarra named Thurruvyns honor as a reason to respect Elminsters claim to the protection of Coronal Eltargrims law, opposing the wishes of his house in doing so.
